'''Why Hit Rocks?''' is a basic daily [[commission]] that can occur in various parts of [[Liyue]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A group of [[hilichurls]] is wandering in the wilderness. Some of them are Geo-enhanced. Defeat all of them and put an end to this threat.}}
#Defeat all enemies (0/X)
#*The enemies include [[Rock Shieldwall Mitachurl]]s, [[Rock Shield Hilichurl Guard]]s, [[Geo Samachurl]]s, and [[Large Pyro Slime]]s.

{{Commission Rewards|full}}
